alert.note: Alert for Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Passaic, northwestern Bergen, northern Westchester, eastern Orange and Rockland Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chester to near Monsey. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Milford, Peekskill, Monsey, Ramsey, Ringwood, Pompton Lakes, Suffern, Monroe, West Point, Warwick, Sloatsburg, Bloomingdale, Chester, Greenwood Lake and Pomona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Passaic
